entry.title: CHEECH & CHONG CLYDE 6 IN DOUBLE CHAMBER BUBBLER
entry.s:vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke
Type: Bubbler
Price: 21.99

The bubbly smoke gets separated, cooled and filtered as its pulled through the slits in the two submerged showerhead diffusers before traveling up the slightly bent neck and out of the bulbous mouthpiece. This process looks great to watch and results in a smoother more enjoyable hit that’s full of flavor and less harsh on the throat and lungs. We recommend placing a metal screen in the herb bowl to prevent unwanted crumbs and ash from traveling into the water.

Specifications

Brand Cheech & Chong
Color clear with black accents
Height 16 cm / 6.3 inches
Percolator Type Showerhead Perc

 

The bubbler measures 16 cm / 6.3 inches in height and both chambers have thick bases for extra stability. The chambers are decorated with a black Cheech & Chong's decal and both of the showerhead diffusers are constructed from beautiful black glass.

The Cheech & Chong’s Clyde dry herb bubbler will look great in any glass collection and comes packed in a themed box.
entry.s:tag: Vendor_Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

entry.title: Hammer Style Bubbler - 5"
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Bubbler
Price: 9.90

Water filtration on the go? Bubblers are here! These hammer style bubblers are made from handblown, borosilicate glass and are perfect for something small but super smooth. These pipes are 5” (12.7cm) in length and have a big, deep bowl. It also comes equipped with a left side choke, which helps regulate air flow during your hit. Add a small amount of water into the chamber, just enough to cover the bottom of the downstem but not too much that you’ll soak your bowl while drawing. Water filtration makes your hit much smoother than with a dry pipe. Try and change the water frequently, as such a small chamber will get grimy quickly. Fully clean this pipe with 99% alcohol. This fun addition to any collection comes in a multitude of colours.

entry.title: Straight Bubbler Glass Aurora Clear and Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Bubbler
Price: 12.49

This 6” Straight Bubbler made from thick, borosilicate glass delivers a clean, smooth hit. It features a diffused downstem to diminish rough draws and a left side choke to help regulate air flow. Adding water to your smoking experience makes it much more enjoyable, and this piece is no exception. Available in Black and Blue and adorned with an Aurora decal by the mouthpiece.

entry.title: FAMOUS X 6 IN HAMMER BUBBLER
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Bubbler
Price: 12.49

Designed for simplicity, our herb bubbler pipes feature modern design, bold colors, and smooth function. These beautiful bubblers are hand-blown, made with the highest quality borosilicate glass, and are ergonomically designed for your smoking pleasure.

Color clear with black, teal or milky teal downstem
Length 15 cm / 6 inches

 

This hammer bubbler pipe uses water to smooth, cool down and filters out of your smoke like a bong, but at 6 inches in length it travels a lot easier than a bong. More than that, it looks awesome with hammer bubbler front and black, teal or milky colored downstem. Chunky and solid, this pipe will offer you years of smoking fun!

entry.title: FAMOUS X 5 IN STRAIGHT HAMMER BUBBLER
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Bubbler
Price: 12.49

Designed for simplicity, our herb bubbler pipes feature modern design, bold colors, and smooth function. These beautiful bubblers are hand-blown, made with the highest quality borosilicate glass, and are ergonomically designed for your smoking pleasure.

  • Quality borosilicate glass
  • Portable design
  • Fixed slitted diffuser
  • Roomy bowl
  • Curvy stem
  • Carb hole on the left side of the bowl
  • Angled bottom
Color clear with green or black colored stem
Length 12 cm / 4.7 inches
Height 10 cm / 4 inches

 

It features a roomy bowl that can hold a nice amount of herb and the angled bottom allows you to place it down on a flat surface, so you can fill up the bowl without having to worry about it tipping over.

To use just place a little bit of water in the bubbler, the water filters the smoke and cools it downs significantly for a much smoother hit then using a dry pipe. Make sure to refresh the water regularly, as this will improve the flavor of your hit. All that is left to do is fill up the bowl with your favorite herbs and fire it up.

The slits in the fixed diffuser downstem separate the smoke and break it up into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration. The clear glass body allows you to see when the bubbler is filled up with smoke, so you know when to inhale. The stem is curvy, which provides you with a much better grip. The carb hole can be found on the left side of the bowl, for more control of your hits.

entry.title: Spider Joint Bubbler
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Bubbler
Price: 4.00

Smoke joints with a spider. This glass bubbler is perfect for taking on the go. Add a small amount of water, put your lit joint in one opening and toke from the other hole. This is ideal for making your joints smoother. Perfect for Halloween! 🎃

entry.title: Assorted Silicone Joint Bubbler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant
Type: Bubbler
Price: 4.50

Silicone joint bubbler allows you to attach water filtration to anything you roll! with a small amount of water, you can make your smoking experience more smooth. A carb hole is located directly above the joint on the top of the bubbler. This hand-held bubbler has a removable top for easy refills and cleaning. The bottom can act as a suction cup to so it does not tip over or get lost. Has many interesting colors.

    To use just place a little bit of water in the bubbler, the water filters the smoke and cools it downs significantly for a much smoother hit then using a dry pipe. Make sure to refresh the water regularly, as this will improve the flavor of your hit. All that is left to do is fill up the bowl with your favorite herbs and fire it up.

    The slits in the fixed diffuser downstem separate the smoke and break it up into smaller particles, increasing the surface area and enhancing filtration. The clear glass body allows you to see when the bubbler is filled up with smoke, so you know when to inhale. The stem is curvy, which provides you with a much better grip. An image of Cheech and Chong decorates the body of the bubbler and the Cheech & Chong’s "Up in Smoke" decal is placed on the stem.
